pr_title: Forbidden aggregated partition key column on mv

timeline.message:
Forbidden aggregated partition key column on mv

The partition column of table also must be the key in materialized view.
If not, when user wants to add partition of table, the be will core.
The materialized view could not create partition correctly when partition column has been aggregated.

Fixed #4342
Change-Id: Idee42a49c61034368c018d33c522dfced673f3bd

timeline.author: wutiangan

replies.bodyText: It can but we need to check it ignore case
replies.author: EmmyMiao87

timeline.author: morningman
